title: Resurrection
description: Death can’t hold him down…   Erik Ashendale is back and ready to pick up where he left off. But things can get tough when you’re a ghost trying to reclaim your life back.  Brought back to Earth thanks to a forbidden spell, Erik is thrust into a world he barely recognizes anymore. In his absence, everyone he thought he once knew has changed, and not all for the better.  Meanwhile, his old nemesis, Alan Greede, is hatching a plot to resurrect the most dangerous demon to ever exist, and literally bring Hell on Earth…
author: Ryan Attard
